title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Guest: Dr. Lawrence Palevsky Dr. <!--more--> Lawrence Palevsky is a board certified pediatrician who uses holistic approaches of pediatric medicine for childrenâ€™s illnesses.
Over the years he has become an outspoken critic of vaccination and an expert in vaccine history and science.
Dr Palevksy is the head of a private practice clinic Holistic Child Health in Northport, New York, where he has become renowned for his treatment of children with autism, autistic spectrum disorders, child learning disabilities and neurological conditions resulting from chronic medication and potential vaccine damage.
He is the past President of American Holistic Medical Association and the current President and co-founder of the Holistic Pediatric Association.
He also sits on the advisory board of the National Vaccine Information Center.
